body:
### Steps to reproduce the issue

I tried to create a pull request with the method described in the Contribution Guide:
https://spack.readthedocs.io/en/latest/contribution_guide.html#branching

This says to create a branch, make your changes, push the changes (to your remote fork), and create a pull request.

### Error Message

If you git clone spack, create a branch, make changes and try to push the changes, you get an authorization error.

### Additional information

At the start of the section, you should add a sentence to the effect of:

"Start by creating a fork of Spack in your private space"

Also add a sentence somewhere saying that when you create a pull request, you should click on "compare across forks".
title: Need clarification in documentation
